Package event

Class ShowResults

  • java.lang.Object
    • event.DeterministicEvent
      • event.ShowResults
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent
    public class ShowResults
extends DeterministicEvent
    The ShowResults class is a subclass of the abstract class DeterministicEvent, from which it inherits the field time, and the hamiltonian simulation. The ShowResults class implements the method simulateEvent() in which the results are shown to the user through a print. The print shows the present instant, i.e., the time at which the print is being shown, the number of move and evaporation events simulated so far in the execution of the hamiltonian stochastic simulation and it also displays the hamiltonian cycle found so far, if it exists. It simulates 20 times during one run of the simulation, i.e., 20 prints are shown to the user from the start to the end of the simulation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShowResults

        public ShowResults​(double time,
                   HamiltonianSimulation sim)
        Constructor for the ShowResults class.
        Parameters:
        time - time of the event, in this case, the print observation.
        sim - the hamiltonian stochastic simulation, from where the graph, pec, colony and finalinst can be accessed.

    • Method Detail

      • SimulateEvent

        public void SimulateEvent()
        Method that simulates one observation of showResults. Firstly, counter of observations is incremented. The print is executed. Finally, the next ShowResults event is scheduled in a deterministic way, i.e., it will occur finalinst/20 instants from the current time, so that in the total runtime 20 observations are simulated.
        Specified by:
        SimulateEvent in interface IEvent
        Specified by:
        SimulateEvent in class DeterministicEvent

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Override of the method toString() to print in a given format the: - number of observation; - present instant; - number of evaporation events; - number of move events; - hamiltonian cycle, if found; - cost of the hamiltonian cycle found;
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
